title: Sample, "Nartaki", 1970–75
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: continuous supplementary weft in a plain weave foundation free floating on one face or laid in the foundation weave; floats have been cut away by hand leaving a pattern which is denser than the foundation fabric
description: Symmetrical geometric pattern in white on an off-white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, "Nartaki", 1970–75.Medium: cotton
Technique: continuous supplementary weft in a plain weave foundation free floating on one face or laid in the foundation weave; floats have been cut away by hand leaving a pattern which is denser than the foundation fabric. 1975-17-3.
